DOTFILES="$HOME/MyPlayground/dotfiles" LOG="$HOME/Library/Logs/mac_cleanup_weekly.log"
echo "=== Weekly Cleanup Report: $(date) ===" >> "$LOG"
# Run dry-run cleanup and capture output OUTPUT=$("$DOTFILES/scripts/mac_cleanup.sh" 2>&1) echo "$OUTPUT" >> "$LOG"
# Extract key info for notification RECLAIMED=$(echo "$OUTPUT" | grep -o "Total space reclaimed: [^ ]*" | head -1)
# Send macOS notification osascript -e "display notification \"$RECLAIMED. Run 'mac_cleanup --apply' to clean.\" with title \"Weekly Cleanup Report\" sound name \"default\""
